name: VideoGen
headline: AI that can create and edit professional videos
description:
VideoGen makes it easy for anyone to create professional, copyright-free videos in seconds. Today, we serve thousands of customers, from individuals and small businesses to teams at Google and ByteDance.

Making videos is hard, time-consuming, and expensive if you hire someone to do it for you. With VideoGen, it only takes a few clicks!

founders.name: Anton Koenig, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of VideoGen. I previously interned at AWS and dropped out of UMass Amherst Computer Science to focus on VideoGen full-time.

founders.name: David Grossman, Founder
founders.description: I'm the cofounder and CTO of VideoGen (S24), a platform for generating professional videos using AI. Before this, I studied Computer Science and Applied Math at Brown and interned at Palantir.

# Generate videos in seconds with AI
Introducing VideoGen, the world's fastest and easiest video creation experience. Ever.
[Get started](https://videogen.io/<https:/app.videogen.io/signup?internalReferrerPath=%2F>)

![Airbus](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/logos/airbus-gray.png)![Salesforce](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/logos/salesforce-gray.png)![Crate & Barrel](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/logos/crateandbarrel-gray.png)![Ernst & Young](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/logos/ey-gray.png)![TikTok](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/logos/tiktok-gray.png)![Google](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/logos/google-gray.png)
Trusted by 0+ marketers, creators, professionals, and businesses
> ‚ÄúVideoGen is awesome to scale up video production and improve turnaround time... The complex process of video editing, which could take days or months, now takes minutes!‚Äù
![](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/website/aray.jpg)
Ary Mas-Aranguiz
L&D Manager @ Google Fiber
![](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/logos/google.png)
> ‚ÄúVideoGen is the most underrated tool for content creators who want to put out the highest quality content in the shortest amount of time.‚Äù
![](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/website/andrewyu.jpg)
Andrew Yu
5M+ TikTok followers
> ‚ÄúWe use VideoGen to rapidly A/B test creatives and iterate fast. This speeds up our process and helps refine our messaging for better results.‚Äù
![](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/website/sunnyk.jpeg)
Sunny Kakullavarapu
CEO @ OHKO Marketing
### Do you value your time? So do we.
Welcome to the fastest video creation experience. Ever. VideoGen will help you write, narrate, find stock footage and edit it all together.
One-Click Video Creation
3M+ Copyright-free Assets
Safe for Commercial Use
[Get started](https://videogen.io/<https:/app.videogen.io/signup?internalReferrerPath=%2F>)
![Collection of images showing different stock footage](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/website/en/generate.jpg)
### No more retakes. Just perfect audio.
Say goodbye to the pain of recording, re-recording... and re-recording. VideoGen will narrate your videos with world's most advanced text-to-speech engine.
150+ Unique Voices
50+ Languages & Accents
Indistinguishable from Human Voices
Your browser does not support the audio element.
Listen to a sample
![Play button](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/website/languages.jpg)
### Add edits with ease.
Adding finishing touches has never been easier. We optimized our video editor to help you create as fast and easy as humanly possible.
Move _lightning-fast_ with instant edits
Edit directly in your browser
[Get started](https://videogen.io/<https:/app.videogen.io/signup?internalReferrerPath=%2F>)
![Collection of images showing different stock footage](https://storage.googleapis.com/videogen-assets/website/en/edits.jpg)

What's possible with VideoGen?
Cost savings on video production
    0x
Less hours spent video editing
    0x
Increased engagement with video
    0%
[Join now](https://videogen.io/<https:/app.videogen.io/signup>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: VideoGen**

Founded in 2023, VideoGen is a San Francisco-based startup that leverages artificial intelligence to transform the cumbersome world of video production. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, they aim to make video creation accessible to everyone‚Äîfrom independent creators to large corporations like Google and ByteDance.

**Mission and Vision (AI-Driven Video Production)**

At its core, VideoGen's mission is to enable anyone to generate and edit professional, copyright-free videos in seconds using AI. Forget the old days of hiring expensive professionals or spending countless hours fine-tuning your footage. With just a few clicks, VideoGen promises to deliver high-quality videos that are ready for commercial use. 

**What They Offer:**

1. **User-Friendly Interface**: The platform simplifies video production, allowing users to create videos effortlessly. It's designed for speed, aiming for the fastest video generation experience available.

2. **Robust Features**:
   - One-click video creation with access to over 3 million copyright-free assets.
   - Advanced text-to-speech capabilities, boasting over 150 unique voices in 50 languages and accents. 
   - A streamlined editing process that allows for instant, browser-based edits.

3. **Value-Driven**: Users report significant time savings on video production‚Äîwhat used to take days can now take minutes.

**Customer Base and Feedback**

VideoGen already serves thousands of customers across various sectors, including marketers and content creators. Users rave about the tool's ability to expedite video production, allowing for quick A/B testing and iterative improvements. For example, Ary Mas-Aranguiz from Google Fiber praised it for enhancing video turnaround times remarkably.

**Team and Leadership**

The company currently operates with a small but efficient team of five, guided by the insights of Garry Tan as their Group Partner. This lean structure reflects the startup‚Äôs agility and focus on innovative solutions in the competitive video creation space.

**Conclusion**

In a nutshell, VideoGen is not just another SaaS tool; it's positioning itself as a game-changer in the realm of content creation. With the explosive growth in video content demand, a platform like VideoGen‚Äîwhich cuts down production time and costs while enhancing quality‚Äîseems well-timed to make waves as it continues to evolve. 

For more information, check out their website: [VideoGen](https://videogen.io).
